gov.nih.nlm.nls.mps
Class Tags

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.nls.mps.Tags
public class Tags
extends java.lang.Object

Determine proper tag for each word.

Determine an absolute match when possible, otherwise calculate the probabilities of the various tags for each word.

Since:
1.0
Version:
2.0, June 9, 2005
Author:
Larry Smith (original MedPost), Jim Mork (MedPost/SKR)

normalize

public void normalize(int numWords,
                      double[] lex_backoff,
                      double[] count)
Normalize dw array.

Parameters:
numWords - Number of words in current sentence
lex_backoff - Array of Lex backoff values for each tag
count - Array of Lexical occurrences counts

tagSet

public void tagSet(int wordPos,
                   int tagPos,
                   boolean cond)
Update dw array based on actual text/tags.

Parameters:
wordPos - Position of this word in the dw array
tagPos - Which tag we are affecting the value for
cond - Ensuring (true) tag or Removing (false) tag probability

checkTags

public void checkTags(java.lang.String word,
                      int i,
                      int wordLen)
Attempt to narrow down or pinpoint actual tag for the given word.

Parameters:
word - Word to check on
i - Position of this word
wordLen - Length of the word to check
